arts.ttl: Wrexham finally win at home as they beat Oxford
arts.sum: Nathan Broadhead scored a first-half winner as 10-man Wrexham recorded a narrow 1-0 Sky Bet Championship result against Oxford for their first home league victory since gaining promotion.

arts.ttl: Wrexham vs Oxford predictions: Racecourse entertainment in store
arts.sum: Wrexham are still waiting for a first home win in the Championship and Enda McElhinney prefers the prospect of goals flowing than taking a strong match stance as the Red Dragons welcome Oxford United.

arts.ttl: “Far stronger”: Wrexham vs Oxford United predictions
arts.sum: The72's writers offer their Wrexham vs Oxford United predictions ahead of the Championship clash on Wednesday night. The post “Far stronger”: Wrexham vs Oxford United predictions appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Wrexham vs Oxford Utd - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Wednesday's Championship clash between Wrexham and Oxford United, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
